item.title: Ollama
item.description: Table of Contents Setting up Ollama Experiment 1 Experiment 2 Experiment 3 Experiment 4 Set Up and Run Ollama in Python 1. Create a virtual environment python3 -m venv venv # activate the virtual environment source venv/bin/activate 2. Install the Ollama Package # install `ollama` in the root directory pip install ollama 3. Create and Edit the Python Script touch run_ollama.py Experiment 1 - Chat with Ollama Open the file in your preferred code editor (e.
